blogs.title: Getting Started with React
blogs.author: John Doe
blogs.body: Are you interested in learning React? This blog post will guide you through the basics of React, including setting up your development environment, understanding components, and managing state with hooks. By the end of this tutorial, you'll be equipped with the knowledge and skills to start building your own React applications.

blogs.title: Mastering CSS Grid
blogs.author: Jane Smith
blogs.body: CSS Grid is a powerful layout system that allows you to create complex and responsive designs. In this comprehensive blog post, you'll dive deep into CSS Grid, learning about grid containers, grid items, grid lines, and various grid layout techniques. With practical examples and tips, you'll gain the expertise to harness the full potential of CSS Grid in your web projects.

blogs.title: Introduction to Node.js
blogs.author: Michael Johnson
blogs.body: Node.js has gained immense popularity in the world of web development. In this introductory blog post, you'll discover the fundamentals of Node.js and its key features. You'll learn how to set up a Node.js environment, handle asynchronous operations with callbacks and promises, and build a simple web server using Express.js. Get ready to embark on your Node.js journey!

blogs.title: This is the new blog title to show my Mum
blogs.body:
So far, she doesn't seem very impressed, but I'm still learning so one day I hope she will be happy and living in Spain!

Muchos gracias
blogs.author: Nick

blogs.title: understanding Nick's Blog
blogs.body: This is all very new to me and have a lack of understanding of the concept.  However I am very happy as he has worked very hard to make sure he attended the Coding Course every day during the week Mon to Friday for four months and the end is almost nigh in fact it is tomorrow.  Well Done Nick.   Great Work
blogs.author: June
